MetaMask.MetamaskDetails: METAMASK is a trusted Ethereum wallet browser plugins, and  it supportsChrome, Firefox and Opera. It can manage your Ethereum wallet in the browser and communicate with Rootrex to complete the transaction.
MetaMask.Affter: After the installation, close the browser and reopen it. Go to rootrex.com.
MetaMask.ClickMetaMask: Click the MetaMask plug-in, set the passwords, import existing wallet and start the transaction.

Help.Firefox: Install from the official plug-in store of Firefox Click here
Help.Opera: Install from the official plug-in store of Opera Click here
